mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, interface_name, method_name, test from sys_power a where delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY interface_name, method_name

select count(*) from sys_user where id = #{userId} and role_id in (select id from sys_role where id in (select role_id from sys_role_dept where dept_id in (select id from sys_dept where id in (select dept_id from sys_dept_power where power_id in (select id from sys_power where interface_name = #{interfaceName} and method_name = #{methodName})))))
select distinct interface_name from sys_power where delete_flag = 0
select method_name from sys_power where delete_flag = 0 and interface_name = #{interfaceName} group by method_name

select a.id, a.create_date, a.create_user, a.delete_flag, a.remark, a.update_date, a.update_user, a.interface_name, a.method_name, a.test from sys_power a left join sys_dept_power b on a.id = b.power_id where a.delete_flag = 0 and b.dept_id = #{deptId}
